com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class ChunkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.ChunkUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorldUtil

    public class ChunkUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utilities to get and set chunks of a world

      • isChunkAvailable

        public static boolean isChunkAvailable(org.bukkit.World world,
                       int x,
                       int z)
        Gets whether a given chunk is readily available. If this method returns False, the chunk is not yet generated.
        Parameters:
        world - the chunk is in
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        Returns:
        True if the chunk can be obtained without generating it, False if not

        Returns:

      • getChunk

        public static org.bukkit.Chunk getChunk(org.bukkit.World world,
                        int x,
                        int z)
        Gets a chunk from a world without loading or generating it
        Parameters:
        world - to obtain the chunk from
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        Returns:
        The chunk, or null if it is not loaded

      • getChunkAsync

        public static void getChunkAsync(org.bukkit.World world,
                 int x,
                 int z,
                 java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Gets, loads or generated a chunk without loading or generating it on the main thread. Allows the lazy-loading of chunks without locking the server.
        Parameters:
        world - to obtain the chunk from
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        runnable - to execute once the chunk is loaded or obtained

        Parameters:
        world - to set the chunk in
        x - - coordinate of the chunk
        z - - coordinate of the chunk
        chunk - to set to (use null to remove)
